metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000338 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier the DSA does notfully validate ASN.1 encoding of signature on verification. It is possibleto inject extra elements in the sequence making up the signature and stillhave it validate, which in some cases may allow the introduction of'invisible' data into a signed structure.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
